posts.author: Mae
posts.content: Hey there. As always, this is an Arelith build request. I wish to play a character that is fast and deal lots of damage with a two handed weapon. My thoughts were a Monk Fighter Weaponmaster, but I wasn't sure about levels or really any other possibilities that could be considered viable. I don't expect to attain a high AC, which is fine; I'm looking for something that can run around and smack things to death quickly.

posts.author: WhiZard
posts.content:
If your stress is on fast try Monk 21/ Fighter 12 / WM 7. Go Halfling or gnome for excellent critical hits with a rapier or scimitar and the ability to deflect arrows while attacking (you can't do this with large weapons, so small races two-handing medium weapons get an advantage).

Pre-epic: Monk 4/Fighter 9/WM 7
Feats: Weapon Focus, Dodge, Mobility, Spring Attack, Expertise, Whirlwind Attack, Weapon of Choice, Blind Fight, Improved Critical, Weapon Specialization, Power Attack, Cleave, Great Cleave

Epic: Monk 17/Fighter 3
Feats: Great Strength IV, Epic Weapon Focus, Epic Weapon Specialization, Overwhelming Critical, Devastating Critical, Epic Prowess

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
WhiZard, Arelith is a lvl 30 server, so I'm afraid your suggestions won't be feasible. I was thinking, if he is going to use a weapon, something like Ranger Monk SD (16 Monk 9 Ranger 5 SD 10 APR dual-kama wielder). Or even Monk Fighter Ranger with the 5th level of Fighter taken post-epic for EWS). There is also a restriction of 3 straight levels of a class in a row, so he needs at least 3 of each class in the build.

Take it EZ!
